verses.text: And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* with the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it shall be on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when ye shall pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, that thou shalt set thee \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w plaister|strong="H7874"\w* them with \w plaister|strong="H7875"\w*:

And thou shalt \w write|strong="H3789"\w* upon them all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, when thou art passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, that thou mayest go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* thee.

Therefore it shall be when ye be gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \add that\add* ye shall set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* these \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*, and thou shalt \w plaister|strong="H7875"\w* them with \w plaister|strong="H7874"\w*.

And there shalt thou \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: thou shalt not lift \w up|strong="H5130"\w* \add any\add* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \add tool\add* upon them.

Thou shalt \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: and thou shalt \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* thereon unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

And thou shalt \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, and shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* there, and \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And thou shalt \w write|strong="H3789"\w* upon the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w very|strong="H3190"\w* \w plainly|strong="H0874"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Take \w heed|strong="H5535"\w*, and \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou art \w become|strong="H1961"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou shalt therefore \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

These shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gerizim|strong="H1630"\w* to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, when ye are come \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*; \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, and \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, and \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*:

And these shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w* to \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*; \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, and \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, and \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*.\f + \fr 27.13 \ft to curse: Heb. for a cursing\f*

¶ And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H6030"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H7311"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*,

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* \add any\add* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* or molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*, an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w craftsman|strong="H2796"\w*, and \w putteth|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* in \add a\add* \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* \add place\add*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that setteth \w light|strong="H7034"\w* by his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w removeth|strong="H5253"\w* his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w landmark|strong="H1366"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that maketh the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* to \w wander|strong="H7686"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w perverteth|strong="H5186"\w* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; because he \w uncovereth|strong="H1540"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* with any manner of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* with his mother in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* \w reward|strong="H7810"\w* to \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* an \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w confirmeth|strong="H6965"\w* not \add all\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.
